reasoning: Chronic condition measured as prevalence. WHO data from 2005 shows approximately 3.2% of children globally were obese (3,200 per 100k). Prevalence is the appropriate metric for this chronic condition.
source: de Onis M et al. (2010). Global prevalence and trends of overweight and obesity among preschool children. Am J Clin Nutr. 92(5):1257-64
